text:
Hi All,

I’m working on a series of content that will look at the biggest challenges facing Marketing Leaders today. In particular issues such as delivering Personalization at scale; how to best harness the rapidly evolving platforms and ecosystems associated with Web 3.0 (TikTok, Metaverse, and more); and creating omnichannel/holistic campaigns that create meaningful experiences for customer communities.

Specifically, I’m looking to chat with those who are working (or have worked) for well-established brands/companies at a Senior Level (Strategists, Managers, Directors, VPs) and share these stories & insights with ClickZ’s audience of 1M+ marketing leaders.

If you’d like to contribute, or even just to chat & learn a little more, I would love to speak. My DM’s are open or you can reach me at <mailto:benjamin.broomfield@contentive.com|benjamin.broomfield@contentive.com>.

Thanks!
Benjamin

text: I'd be careful about anyone offering to get you a link from Forbes, especially if they charge you for it.  That would violate Forbes' guidelines and they've been cracking down on and banning contributor accounts that are doing that.

elements.text: I'd be careful about anyone offering to get you a link from Forbes, especially if they charge you for it.  That would violate Forbes' guidelines and they've been cracking down on and banning contributor accounts that are doing that.

text: For the other sites, you can contact them and offer to submit guest posts.

text: hold on there! we don't allow link swaps in this group and will delete any posts offering them. please take a look at our community guidelines: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/15GMUom_zSQZboJE149U9hH6AJeHGQVPMAGibI4DLKeM/edit?usp=sharing>
Hey if you are interested in guest post in a tech blog (DA 45+) let me know

text: Hey Danielle, Did you have any success? I am kinda on the same boat. Had some learnings. Happy to share notes & learn from you as well
